definition[0]: made to look exactly like something else, in order to deceive people
definition[1]: to copy something exactly in order to deceive people
definition[2]: made to look exactly like something, usually illegally
example[2]: Last year about $80 million in counterfeit notes were seized, compared with $77 billion in genuine notes produced.
example[3]: the growing trade in counterfeit goods
definition[3]: to copy something so that it looks like something else, usually illegally
example[4]: We must mark coins in a way that makes them harder to counterfeit.
